system.requirements: Explorator, RT Rank 3+. Toughness 35+, Intelligence 40+,  Autosanguine or Prosanguine Talents.
system.descriptionText: Unlike many of the Mechanicus, the Genetor sees living flesh not as a weakness, but instead as another form of machine, one that through dedication may too be given strength and improved beyond its baseline form.
system.effects:
Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Genetor
Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent A Machine of Flesh
Errata Note: A Machine of Flesh's Talent Group should not include Multiple Arms or Winged.

description.value:
Unlike many of the Mechanicus, the Genetor sees living flesh not as a weakness, but instead as another form of machine, one that through dedication may too be given strength and improved beyond its baseline form.
